result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rodney L Christmas

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:43 PM Defendant Rodney L Christmas in court.  Attorney Claude-Allan Milhomme in court for Rodney L Christmas.  Prosecuting attorney Kelly Larsen in court for the State of Wisconsin. DAR Court Reporter: Taryn Strickland. 
Deft has picked up a new file in case 22CM956 which atty Milhomme is not appointed on.
RCAP has filed a violation report on 8-10-22.
Deft failed to report to RCAP.
Defense indicates the deft was confused and there should be no more issues.
Defense is requesting a 60 day adjournment to be appointed on the new file.
BTC: Take no action on bond, deft is to report to RCAP after court, matters adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
DA AUTHORIZATION TO OBTAIN COPIES OF CERTAIN EVIDENCE

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Do not drive unless properly licensed. Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

2:39 PM Defendant Rodney L Christmas in court.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew W Kline appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on August 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
